name: Avoid Programs with COUNT(*) statement  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having COUNT(*) statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Programs with COUNT(*) statement.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: COUNT(*) statement is time and ressource consuming and it can dramatically slow your application.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of COUNT(*) in the programs.
remediationSample:
Remediation for Sample:
C/EXEC SQL      
C+ select column1,column2,count(Primary_key_column)      
C+ from sample_table;    
C/END-EXEC
sample:
C/EXEC SQL      
C+ select column1,column2,count(*)    // Quality Rule Violation  
C+ from sample_table;    
C/END-EXEC
